work.title: Software Developer & Co-Founder at Guman
work.description:
• Participated in requirements gathering and design development meetings.
• Wrote, modified and maintained software documentation and specifications.
• Participated in performance analysis, design and code development.
• Analyzed and designed algorithms for calculating various survey-related metrics.
• Developed and designed E-R diagrams, UML and resulting graph architecture for the client side.
• Refactoring and bug fixing.
• Developed an implementation of multi-modular application architecture.
• Developed and design code base of a centralized authentication and authorization server.
• Communicating and writing SWOT analyzes for technical decision making.
• Developed and analysis of custom formulas for calculating various resulting client data.

work.title: Full Stack Developer at ISD
work.description:
• Participated in requirements gathering and design development meetings.
• Wrote, modified and maintained software documentation and specifications.
• Participated in performance analysis, design and code development.
• Analyzed customer requirements and implemented them in accordance with the reference.
• Refactoring and bug fixing.
• Developed various of enhancements and deficiencies.
• Communicating with business analysts and testers for technical decision making.
